definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: The kidney-shaped seed of this tree eaten after roasting .
sentences.chinese: 这种树的肾状种籽，烤后可食。

sentences.english: Any of various plants of the genus Allium with edible bulbs found growing wild.
sentences.chinese: 野生的葱属众多植物的任何一种，具有可食的球茎。

sentences.english: An edible emulsion with insoluble fiber is described.
sentences.chinese: 本申请涉及一种含有不溶性纤维的可食乳浊液。

sentences.english: Brazilian palm of genus euterpe whose buds are eaten like cabbage when young.
sentences.chinese: 巴西棕榈科植物叶芽如卷心菜嫩时可食。

sentences.english: The pulp of fruit is edible and tastes sweet and acidic.
sentences.chinese: 果瓣跟剥开的蒜瓣相似，果肉可食，味道酸甜。

sentences.english: Morus having edible fruit that resembles the blackberry.
sentences.chinese: 桑属植物，果实可食，类似于黑莓。

sentences.english: Any of various New World shrubs of the genus Gaylussacia, related to the blueberries and bearing edible fruit.
sentences.chinese: 越橘美洲无芒药属灌木，与乌饭树有关，果实可食。

sentences.english: Tropical american yam with small yellow-skinned edible tubers .
sentences.chinese: 热带美洲薯蓣科植物，有黄皮的可食块茎。

sentences.english: Australian palm with leaf buds that are edible when young.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲蒲葵属植物，幼树的叶芽可食。

sentences.english: Potato is a tropical American yam with small yellow- skinned edible tubers.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯是热带美洲薯蓣科植物，有黄皮的可食块茎。

sentences.english: Edible business card made for the Bombay Bakery in Pakistan. [link]
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦的孟买面包房专用，可食。

sentences.english: Philippine tree similar to the breadfruit tree bearing edible fruit.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾树种，类似于面包树的可食果实。

sentences.english: Canna grown especially for its edible rootstock from which arrowroot starch is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 美人蕉属植物，根茎可食，是食用淀粉的来源。

sentences.english: The fleshy red calyxes of roselle are edible.
sentences.chinese: 洛神葵的肉质花萼可食。

sentences.english: Old World star of Bethlehem having edible young shoots.
sentences.chinese: 旧大陆的一种虎眼万年青，具有可食的幼苗。

sentences.english: Moreover, some of the other wild species in this genus also had the potential to be domesticated for the edibility of fruits.
sentences.chinese: 该属还有其它可食种类，具备驯化为栽培水果的潜力。

definition: Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
